title: Need font ID
content:
Please guys, I need to find this font ID, I know is similar to the ''Britannic Medium'' but I need to know the exact ID...

Thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cruzcampo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215223853/http:/typophile.com/files/cruzcampo.jpg) | 288.1 KB |
author: Dracuwail

comments.content: Can someone please ID the font for Orencia? It looks like a cleaner one-off of Trajan.

Can't find a match and doubt there'll be one. This kind of woodmark is most of time hand-drawn or heavily customization of an existing typeface. It loosely reminds me of [Clearface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215223853/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/clearface) and [Cheltenham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215223853/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/cheltenham) but that's far from being even close.  
If you need as vector, you'll find it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215223853/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/logo?search_api_views_fulltext=cruzcampo), freely available to download.
